ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D5100 16.2MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3-Inch Vari-Angle LCD Monitor
The 3.0" vari-angle LCD monitor opens horizontally up to 180? and flips up and down from +180? to -90?. The vari-angle LCD monitor lets you check your composition comfortably while using Live View or full HD movie.
A high-resolution 16.2MP DX-format CMOS sensor and an EXPEED 2 image processing engine guarantee superb quality and high performance.
Delivers exceptional D-Movie performance with its full HD (1,920 x 1,080/30p) capability, full-time-servo AF (AF-F) and precise exposure control. In-camera movie editing and sound recording capability are also provided.
This DSLR Body is a direct import item. Comes with a 1 year store warranty.
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera Body
